sentences.en: Awarded to Manuel Barbeito at the Industrial Health and Safety Office in Maryland for scientific studies that found microbes cling to beards, making more hirsute men a potential laboratory hazard.
sentences.cn: 该奖项授予来自马里兰州工业卫生安全办公室的曼纽尔·巴尔贝托，他发现胡须上的微生物使多毛男人成为实验室的潜在危险。

sentences.en: He was wearing shorts which showed his long, muscular, hirsute legs.
sentences.cn: 他穿着短裤，露出自己强壮多毛的长腿。

sentences.en: Instead of the peaceful hirsute ornamentof the past he is now marring his face with a lot of bristles.
sentences.cn: 替代他过去平和的多毛的胡子，大量的粗短毛被他用来损伤自己的脸。

sentences.en: Men also have hair dryers and, if they suffer from baldness, they use a growth stimulator, buy hairpieces, or have hair transplanted from the hirsute part of the scalp to the bare areas.
sentences.cn: 男士也有他们的吹风机,而且如果他们秃顶的话, 还会用毛发生长剂 、 买假发, 或者把头发从密集的地方移植到谢顶的地方.

sentences.en: You're looking very hirsute, Richard are you growing a beard?
sentences.cn: 理查德,瞧你一脸的胡子--是不是在留胡子了?

words.tran_cn: 多毛症（尤指妇女多毛症）

trans.tran_cn: （尤指男子）多毛发的，头发蓬乱的
trans.tran_en: having a lot of hair on your body and face
